headline.main: 1966: Syria Offers Aid to Rebels to Overthrow Hussein

snippet: From the archives of The International Herald Tribune: The Syrian president, Noureddin Atassi, offers arms to Jordanian rebels protesting against King Hussein in Damascus, in December 1966....
abstract: From the archives of The International Herald Tribune: The Syrian president, Noureddin Atassi, offers arms to Jordanian rebels protesting against King Hussein in Damascus, in December 1966.
